phrases: Sakura Hall
Let us Make a Game!
Pitch
I fell asleep...?
Good morning, kouhai-kun!
What are you painting on my walls?!
It is the Milky Way Cat, Nyapollon!
Nyapollon?
It is a character from a full-length anime series that...
I have been working on since I was in kindergarten!
That...
He is a weapon designed to protect Earth from the Nyangoro space invaders.
After they beat their first Nyangoro invader,
they study it, cultivate its cells...
and warp space-time to create a hybrid robot!
However, it can only be piloted by someone...
who has experienced the worst life has to offer!
What a ridiculous plot.
Nekoko, the heroine, has a boyfriend, Nekosuke,
who gets killed by the enemy commander, Ein the Hunchback!
Nekoko decides to cast aside...
her sadness and pilot Nyapollon!
But Ein the Hunchback is so powerful...
that 60 of the human race is...
Um, how long does this story go on for?
already dead by the start of the series.
52 episodes altogether!
I could probably summarize it in three days.
How about you stop now!
I woke up early for once.
I do not want to be late on the first day of second semester...
That clock's stopped.
Huh?
Because I removed the batteries!
Do not do stupid pranks like that!
And do not just carry on drawing in silence over there!
Suimei University of the Arts Cultural Festival
I just made it.
You should have said something to me before you left.
Sorry.
I will start doing that as of tomorrow.
Hey, did you hear?
Aoyama-san moved into Sakura Hall...
so she could be with Kanda.
I heard that Kanda basically ordered her...
to go and move in with him.
I heard that they share the same room.
Nanami's so forward!
This is strictly confidential,
but I heard that she is already pregnant.
I am not pregnant!
What is this?
You are not denying the rest of it?
You really did move into Sakura Hall, did not you?
I did, but we have different rooms!
Kanda-kun, do not just keep quiet!
Tell them!
I cannot believe I have been caught up in this...
Save me, darling.
You can do it, husband!
Stop it!
Quit bothering Nanami!
Miyahara?
Miyahara-kun?
I-I mean, quit bothering Nanami and Sorata.
Sorata's not an immoral guy.
Is not that right?
But they really do live under the same roof, right?
Miyahara, why are you getting so huffy about it?
Well, because I... you know...
Sorata's my friend,
so I cannot just ignore any weird rumors about him...
I shared a room with Sorata...
in the regular dorms in our first year.
Of course you are going to share a roof...
By the way, why are you blushing, Miyahara?
with someone if you live in dorms.
Huh?
I have got it!
You are the one dating Kanda-kun!
What?!
I see!
You do not want Nanami to take your beloved Kanda-kun away!
Miyahara-kun, how gallant!
I support your relationship!
Oh, I see...
Kanda-kun and Miyahara-kun are an item.
They do make a good couple.
So they are both gay!
Miyahara...
How did it come to this?!
K-Kanda-kun!
Do not worry!
You can love whoever you want!
Whoever you choose to love, we will still be friends!
Do not get carried away with the crowd!
of second semester because of weird rumors going around about me.
It is all because of the way the residents of Sakura Hall...
conduct themselves on a daily basis.
From now on, let us follow the rules...
and lead pure and proper high school lives.
All right?
Okay, okay.
Only say it once!
Okaaay.
Do not draw it out!
I am so glad you are here, Aoyama.
Thanks for the food.
I had terrible things happen to me, too.
On top of that, I almost got hit by a hearse on the way home.
When I tried to get out of the way, I stepped in the gutter.
I even got clawed by a black cat that just happened to be there.
Talk about an unlucky first day.
All I can do is pray nothing else bad happens...
Do not involve us in your misfortune.
Kouhai-kun, settle down!
S-Sorry.
This weather really does seem foreboding.
Must be a fall storm.
Okay, okay.
Only say it once!
Good evening.
I apologize for dropping in so suddenly.
A-A foreigner?!
Are you dazzled by my beauty?
You are dazzled by my beauty, are not you?
I-I cannot speak English.
It is Rita.
Mashiro!
You seem to be keeping well, Mashiro.
I am glad.
You, too.
She is a real doll!
She is a babe!
Mashiro-chan, do you know her?
Oh, it is Rita.
Good to see you again, Chihiro-san.
Who is she?
She was Mashiro's roommate when she lived in England.
I am Rita Ainsworth.
Nice to meet you.
But, Rita, what are you doing here?
Cinderella's magic has been dispelled.
I am here to take Kaguyahime back to the moon.
Mashiro, please come back...
to England with me immediately.
What?!
You came here to take Mashiro-chan back with you?
Yes.
I cannot allow Mashiro to continue studying manga here.
I will not go home.
I thought you might say that.
But please reconsider.
Do not you realize how much potential you have in those fingers?
Your paintings may even go down in history.
There are lots of people itching to see your next masterpiece.
Will not you scratch that itch?
You encouraged me to draw manga.
I only taught you how to use a computer.
I never encouraged you to do anything.
Rita...
I cannot sit back and watch you waste your time and talent any longer.
Come, Mashiro.
Together, we
I am not going home.
W-Wait, just listen to me, Mashiro!
I am not going home.
Hey, are you sure about this, Shiina?
Mashiro, I will not give up!
I will take you back to England with me!
Do you hear me?!
You are going after her?
I cannot just leave her out there.
You want Mashiro-chan to go back to England?
I cannot just leave her!
I figured you would come.
You knew I would come?
When a damsel's in distress,
a kind boy always comes to save her.
I brought her back here, but this is crazy.
She immediately said she wanted to take a bath.
Honestly, English people...
Sorata.
Wh-Why are not you wearing any clothes?!
I do not have a change of clothes.
I intended to return home straight away.
Just put some clothes on!
This belongs to Mashiro, does not it?
I do her laundry for her.
As her former roommate, you must understand.
I see.
You are on Mashiro Duty in Japan.
You did that in England, too?
Yes.
Over there, I was on Mashiro Duty.
You can look this way now.
Mashiro drew half of this, did not she?
You can tell just by looking?
I have been with Mashiro since we met...
at my grandfather's studio when we were six years old.
I do not draw anymore, though.
Why not?
You will let me stay in this room tonight, will not you?
Y-You are staying here?!
I have not booked a hotel.
Or are you the type of person who throws someone out after you have taken them in?
Fine.
I will sleep in the dining room.
No, you will sleep here, as well.
With you?!
I want you to tell me about Mashiro's life in Japan.
Do not you want to know what Mashiro's life...
was like in England?
Is Shiina really that amazing?
Mashiro's overwhelming.
Overwhelming?
It makes me wish she would just disappear.
You should be careful.
If you stay by Mashiro's side, you will be destroyed, too.
Just like I have been...
Destroyed?
Her paintings will go down in history...
Please reconsider.
Do not you realize how much potential you have in those fingers?
Kanda-kun, it is already past eight.
N-No!
Do not get the wrong idea!
Our relationship is pure, proper, and appropriate for high schoolers!
It is fine that you let her stay here...
but you have become awfully close, have not you?
Sorata, are you on Rita's side?
No, I...
Yes, he is.
I have decided to stay in Sorata's room...
until you agree to come back to England with me.
What?!
Without even consulting me?!
Sorata's my enemy.
I am not!
Congratulations, kouhai-kun!
You have now reached adulthood!
Today is the day I relinquish my title of Flying Ace.
It is all up to you now, Sorata!
Kanda, I have always thought you were pretty annoying.
That has no bearing on this situation at all!
You are too loud first thing in the morning.
What is this place, a zoo during breeding season?
Y-You...
Y-You...
I am what?
You!
You came out of your room?!
I have not seen some of your faces before.
Let me introduce myself.
I am Akasaka Ryunosuke.
I am the occupant of Room 102.
You have received a message!
Akasaka-kun, are my lessons boring you?
I have no interest in most things in this world.
And I hate women, so do not talk to me.
You finally came to school for the first time in five months.
It would be nice if you at least stopped eating tomatoes and listened to my lesson.
Tomatoes are nutritious and scrumptious.
I am only here to increase my attendance scores,
so there is no reason for me to listen.
If you have a problem with that, you should come up...
with a lesson I can actually take some interest in, Shiroyama Koharu.
How dare you talk balk to your teacher?!
What is your problem?!
I am going to tell Chihiro-chan about this!
What are you going to do about Rita-san?
Do you want Mashiro to go back to England?
Some things cannot be done over.
No good will come of me overthinking this.
Shiina's the one who has to decide.
Here, your laundry...
You idiot.
You are an idiot.
Ultimate Melon Bun
You are a Sorata idiot.
What kind of idiot is that?!
Let the Japanese and English Declaration of Friendship...
Lines I Always Wanted to Say Once event begin!
Here we go again...
I will start!
I will give you half of this world.
Next!
Driver, follow that car!
Nice, Rittan!
You are next!
Me?
Do you want the good news or the bad news first?
You are next!
I am next?
YOU-Uh, um...
Do not spout such nonsense... or something.
My turn.
Will you go on just one date with me?
If possible, I would like to go out tomorrow.
Your
What do you think you are saying?!
Unfortunately, I am busy for the next ten years.
Your turn.
I do not mind waiting ten years...
to go on a date with such an incredible girl.
Back to you.
What are you guys talking about?!
He made that all up!
They are all lies!
We are speaking out of order.
We skipped Mashiro.
Mashiro-chan, it is your turn.
Sorata is an idiot.
Hey, have you come up with something for this year's culture festival yet?
I guess I should do an oil painting.
Hey, let us go buy some paints together.
Yeah, let us.
Oh, Shiho.
Why do not you come with us, Shiho?
Let us all go together.
Huh?
Okay...
Shiina, I am here to
I feel like I have to tell you this now, so I am texting you.
I am confused, too.
She just suddenly turned up,
and said she was taking you back to England.
When she said your paintings would go down in history,
it really made me think.
It made me wonder what is actually best for you.
I am not on Rita's side,
but I am not sure I am on your side, either.
It is just...
I am really looking forward to your serialized manga.
I mean it.
Sending
Does she even know how to check her messages?
Received Message Shiina Mashiro Re: No Subject
Received Message Shiina Mashiro Re: No Subject You
What do you mean, you?
For Sorata is an idiot.
That does not have you in it!
Men, the day has finally arrived!
Hey!
Misaki-senpai, I can see your underwear!
Come down from there, Senpai!
Now that we have assembled the strongest warriors of Sakura Hall,
we must harness our power of friendship...
and take control of the culture festival!
In other words, she is saying that the residents of Sakura Hall...
should band together and do something for the culture festival.
Oh...
I do not mind.
Sounds fun.
Huh?
Well, I am all for it.
Ryunosuke says: No problems here.
Everyone approves, so it is decided!
If we are going to do something,
we should make something only Sakura Hall could make!
Yeah, but...
Misaki-senpai and Shiina could do the art,
Jin-san could write the script, and Aoyama could provide the voices...
With talent like that, we could make an amazing video.
And Sakura Hall even has the Dragon!
Ryunosuke
A programmer!
The Dragon?
She means Akasaka.
His name's Ryunosuke, and the ryu means dragon.
Mitaka Jin : Misaki and Mashiro will do the artwork, I will write the script, and Aoyama-san will do the voices.
Akasaka Ryunosuke : Same as always.
Mitaka Jin : Could you use your talents to help us make something interactive like a game instead of just a simple animation?
Should we create something that uses a controller, like a game?
I see.
But if we do that, only one person at a time can enjoy it.
Is there any way...
that we can make it an attraction everyone can participate in?
Everyone?
For example, when the audience claps,
the character moves, or raises its arms...
I was just wondering if there was a way to make something...
that allows everyone to work together to move the story forward.
That is it, kouhai-kun!
I think that sounds fun, too.
I think it is a great idea, too.
Good, good!
I knew you could do it, kouhai-kun!
I can feel your burning passion!
I will notify Ryunosuke.
If you have made a decision,
be sure to submit your plan to the Student Council as soon as possible.
You cannot participate if you do not receive permission.
The Student Council...
Is something wrong?
No, nothing.
In that case,
we would better start developing our content soon.
We are starting from scratch so we do not have much time.
Nyapollon.
That is it, Mashiron!
Ryunosuke says that if we borrow equipment...
from a hardware store, we can turn Sorata's idea into reality.
That is amazing!
Just what is Akasaka-kun, anyway?
All right!
The director will be... Kouhai-kun!
It is up to you!
What?!
No objections!
We are counting on you, Kanda-kun!
Mitaka Jin : Sorata will be the director.
Akasaka Ryunosuke : No complaints here.
Sorata, fight.
What?
I am supposed to... lead this bunch?
A culture festival?
That sounds fun.
Yeah, but the situation has gotten a little out of hand...
Rita.
What is it, Mashiro?
Rita, sleep in my room from now on.
What brought about this change of heart?
You cannot sleep in Sorata's room anymore.
You do not have to worry about us.
Unlike Jin, Sorata's good for nothing.
Hey!
Do you have any idea how hard...
my rationality's been fighting every night?!
I do not mind sleeping in Mashiro's room.
What?
But I have one condition.
Sorata.
What?
Me?
This Sunday, go on a date with me.
What?!
Th-This is...
But this is a hotel!
It sure is.
You would not embarrass me...
by turning me down in front of a hotel, would you?
No, let us wait!
We should definitely wait on this!
Hey, stop it!
I will be gentle.
What?!
What are you going to do to me?!
Kanda-kun!
What a coincidence.
You said it.
I refuse to believe in a coincidence like this!
Now, now.
Since we are all here, the four of us should go in together.
The four of us?
European Young Artists Modern Art Exhibit
So, this was your actual destination.
I-I am kind of nervous...
Y-Yeah...
Sorata, over here.
Shiina?
I wanted to show you this painting.
It is the last painting Mashiro did before she came to Japan.
Has this helped you understand Mashiro a little better?
I read the manga Mashiro wrote over here.
I do not really get manga,
but even so, I did not think it was worth giving up painting for.
What do you think, Sorata?
Shiina should...
return to the world of fine arts.
My routine has been upended by that freeloader.
Why is she going to the bathroom at 6:45 in the morning?
That is the time I use it!
